blog.description: kai //bi/ they/them //header by spidaerman.

summary: andi mack mbti: andi
title: andi mack mbti: andi
body:
exi’ve seen so little andi mack mbti posts i kinda wanted to do a mini-series thing based on what i’ve seen

andi mack: infp

dominant function: introverted feeling

in touch with her feelings, reflective on her experiences, can develop deep attachments to external objects (i.e the bracelet, most of the things she uses to craft in andi shack), if inspired infps can take up a niche/cause a.k.a when she protested w buffy and cyrus to get the school dress code changed. 

auxiliary function: extraverted intuition

likes exploring nature or culture ( andi’s love of art, the art gallery, the art festival), functions either expressively or receptively (brainstorms aloud), i.e andi’s “processing, processing, processing”. CREATIVE AF. enjoys asking questions in conversations, likes learning more about people, can be indecisive or unsure about something (ANDI’S WHOLE RELATIONSHIP WITH JONAH), open to new experiences

tertiary function: introverted sensing

often minimalistic, likes upcycling or reusing things they already have (most of andi’s crafts. the quilt of scarves, making the hospital bracelets into one bracelet, the nickelback cd disco ball thingy), likes thrift stores, recalls past experiences to guide future decisions

inferior function: extraverted thinking

hard to access, likes being organized in some way, hard to maintain organization, can get overwhelmed having to make a bunch of extraverted thinking related decisions

blog.name: libbybeck
blog.title: nb edit witch
blog.description: kai //bi/ they/them //header by spidaerman.

summary: a very lonely summer (andi mack drabble)
title: a very lonely summer (andi mack drabble)
body:
Her mom was giving her a makeover. Andi smiled as Bex applied each stroke of blush, eyeliner, mascara, and lipstick. She watched as Bex neatly combed her hair. She hadn’t heard from Bowie, or Ham, or Jonah for that matter since school let out. She hoped Ham was having a nice trip and that he “found” himself, whatever that meant. She hoped that Bowie and his band were having fun. She hoped that Jonah met a nice girl, maybe even Natalie and they clicked. Jonah should still be happy. Andi’s face turned sour at her next thought.

“Andiman?” Bex’s smile faded. She turned down the music.

“I’m right here, Mom.”

“Is something wrong? Your makeup looks beautiful, I love the dress you picked out, and… Buffy said she was coming over later so… what could possibly be wrong?”

“It’s the song,” Andi muttered.

Bex stepped back. “The song? You love this song. This playlist is literally crafted by your suggestions and you said…”

“Girls love girls and boys,” Andi hummed to herself, hoping Bex wouldn’t hear.

It took Bex a second.

“You are excited for Buffy to come over, aren’t you? You guys haven’t hung out much this summer. I know she got a boyfriend, that Marty guy. Has that made things weird between you?”

Andi hesitated.

“Not for her.”

Bex waited. Andi didn’t finish the thought. “And for you?”

Andi resisted the urge to cry. Bex had spent so long on this makeup and besides Buffy kept sending texts about her excitement towards Andi’s big surprise. A new look.

Andi choked the words out, forcing every syllable. “I thought it wouldn’t. I mean I was the original muffy shipper but…”

Bex placed the makeup brush on the table. “But it has, hasn’t it?” Bex asked.

Andi nodded.

“Andi, you don’t have to say anything right now, ok? There’s something about me that you don’t know.”

Andi laughed. “Is that even possible? How many secrets can you have?”

“There aren’t just boys in my memory box,” she paused, studying Andi’s face. “There’s girls too.”

Andi smiled slightly.

“When you’re ready, and it doesn’t have to be right now because these kind of things can be difficult to say aloud, but do you have a crush on Buffy?”

“I think so. And it… it really sucks, Mom. and it’s been so long, and we’ve been best friends for so long… how can this not change everything.”

Bex replied dryly. “Ask the universe?”

“That’s a Bowie line.”

“I thought it might cheer you up. It’s going to be alright, and I understand if you want to cancel on Buffy.”

“No, we need to talk. I’ve been avoiding her for too long.”

“If you say so. I’ll finish up then.”

“Girls love girls and boys,” Andi hummed to herself, hoping Bex wouldn’t hear.

It took Bex a second.

“You are excited for Buffy to come over, aren’t you? You guys haven’t hung out much this summer. I know she got a boyfriend, that Marty guy. Has that made things weird between you?”

Andi hesitated.

“Not for her.”

Bex waited. Andi didn’t finish the thought. “And for you?”

Andi resisted the urge to cry. Bex had spent so long on this makeup and besides Buffy kept sending texts about her excitement towards Andi’s big surprise. A new look.

Andi choked the words out, forcing every syllable. “I thought it wouldn’t. I mean I was the original muffy shipper but…”

Bex placed the makeup brush on the table. “But it has, hasn’t it?” Bex asked.

Andi nodded.

“Andi, you don’t have to say anything right now, ok? There’s something about me that you don’t know.”

Andi laughed. “Is that even possible? How many secrets can you have?”

“There aren’t just boys in my memory box,” she paused, studying Andi’s face. “There’s girls too.”

Andi smiled slightly.

“When you’re ready, and it doesn’t have to be right now because these kind of things can be difficult to say aloud, but do you have a crush on Buffy?”

“I think so. And it… it really sucks, Mom. and it’s been so long, and we’ve been best friends for so long… how can this not change everything.”

Bex replied dryly. “Ask the universe?”

“That’s a Bowie line.”

“I thought it might cheer you up. It’s going to be alright, and I understand if you want to cancel on Buffy.”

“No, we need to talk. I’ve been avoiding her for too long.”

“If you say so. I’ll finish up then.”

blog.name: thinkingabouttyrus

blog.description: A Cyrus Goodman and TJ Kippen appreciation blog

summary: The Love Language of the “Andi Mack” characters
body:
The Love Language of the “Andi Mack” characters

So… because I feel so deprived of Andi Mack (DISNEY, RELEASE THE TRAILER YOU COWARDS), I started thinking about the Love Language of the characters.

if you’re not familiar with the concept, we all have a Love Language. It is the way we show love to our loved one and the way we want to be shown that we are loved. We all have different love languages and relationships (whether it’s romantic, platonic, or familial) are successful if you know the other person’s Love Language. Some people have one Love Language, some have more.

If you’re interested in knowing what yours is, you can take this quiz!

The 5 Love Languages are:

  1. Words of affirmation: Using words to build up the other person to show love. 
  2. Gifts: You give the other person gifts.
  3. Acts of Service: Doing things for the other person.
  4. Quality time: Spending time with the other person doing things they or both of you enjoy.
  5. Physical touch: You express love through physical affection like kissing, hand holding, and hugging.

Now, for the Andi Mack characters. To make it simple, I’ll focus on the Good Hair Crew and their romantic relationships. Also, feel free to add to this too! I’d love to hear everyone else’s thoughts! 

1. Andi

Quality time:

What I noticed about Andi is that she genuinely just wants to spend time with Jonah. In the beginning, she joined the Space Otters for Jonah. In “Were We Ever”, she tells Jonah that he loves Frisbee, whereas she likes it. 

After Jonah breaks up with Amber and starts spending more time with Andi, this makes her happy and, of course, believe that they were dating and are boyfriend-girlfriend. There’s also the double-date with Buffy and Marty at the virtual reality arcade. When Jonah almost didn’t go to the Grease sing-along with her, she was clearly unhappy. Her joy at finally going on an actual real date with Jonah at the trampoline building was super clear…and then she gets upset again when he broke the news that he was leaving. 

We even see this with Walker, when he takes her to the art gallery. She was genuinely having a great time and was happy, which further added to her inner conflict about which guy was right for her.  

Gifts:

We know how creative Andi is and how passionate she is with her crafts. The obvious display of this Love Language is the bracelet. She made it for Jonah with her feelings in mind. To her, that’s the symbol of their relationship so when Jonah stopped wearing it, she was rightfully upset. And when he starts wearing it again, it’s symbolic of their relationship starting again. And… we all saw how Jonah was with gift-giving, but Andi still appreciated the gestures. 

Her conflict with her feelings for Jonah and Walker began with that beautiful sketch that Walker made as a gift (sure, he took it back again later, but he left her with those fun polaroids). And, then, later, he gives her the cool shoes.

2. Buffy

Words of Affirmation

We all know Buffy likes getting compliments and praises. She thrives in words of affirmation - when she’s told that she’s the best, that she’s brave, that she’s the fastest, etc. 

Marty calls her the fastest girl but then calls himself the fastest boy and their whole relationship revolves around this rivalry and friendly banter that just… works. Marty’s banter with her have some hidden compliments and praise. And when she makes the basketball team but he didn’t, he told her that he was genuinely happy for her. 

Acts of Service

I feel like Buffy would also have the Love Language of Acts of Service. The things that stand out in my head are very minor things, so it might not be accurate.

Marty gets her napkins because he knows that she always gets extra napkins. He willingly banters with her and competes with her because he knows she thrives in it.

With Jonah, what stands out to me was that arm wrestling scene during the Ren Faire. She shares why she wants to be seen as brave and strong and Jonah challenged her because he knew that she needed it at that moment. And you can tell how grateful Buffy was at that.

With Walker, he makes that sketch for her of the Good Hair Crew before she moved to Phoenix. Walker, who didn’t know who she was but had come because he wanted to do this for Andi and her friend, that’s really touching and I can see why Cyrus would assume that she had a crush on him. 

3. Cyrus

Acts of Service

We know the type of person of Cyrus is. He likes doing things for his friends and tries to help them in the best way he could, even though sometimes it can be borderline invasive and meddlesome, but that’s how he shows his love. And, ultimately, we see him like this in his relationship with Iris when he tried to win her prizes during their carnival date.

And we see this with Jonah, as well. He tries to do so many things for Jonah, like going to his practices and making sure everyone is hydrated. He supports Jonah during his Frisbee tryouts. In turn, his feelings for Jonah were fueled by Jonah being there in important moments of his life, like when he helped him learn how to skateboard and was there to help Cyrus pick out a suit for his Bar Mitzvah.

With TJ, we were gifted with that beautiful scene of him listening to TJ as he shares the secret about his dyscalculia with him. He invites him to his Bar Mitzvah.He goes out of his way to help TJ and Buffy reconcile by staging that ambush so they could play a one-on-one game. In turn, TJ helps him with his somersault and this happens right before Cyrus realizes that his feelings for Jonah had changed. 

Physical Touch

I don’t have a lot to say with this but Cyrus did mention to Iris that he liked holding hands. He was also genuinely excited to have gotten his first kiss. We know that he likes hugging Jonah and that was how he determined his feelings for him, with the beating of his heart. And although he and TJ barely touched, except for maybe that one side hug in “Buffy In A Bottle”, he and TJ tend to stand pretty close to each other a lot.

Again, I’m not quite certain if any of these are accurate but that’s how I read into their Love Languages. 

If you guys want me to decipher any other characters’ Love Language, feel free to send me an ask!
